ygData.subject: Erud's Tonic
ygData.msgSnippet: I went west a while ago to sell items....well a friend requested 2 items if I could pick them up for him. They are for a quest for a Bartender s Book in
ygData.messageBody:
I went west a while ago to sell items....well a friend requested 2 items
if I could pick them up for him. They are for a quest for a Bartender's
Book in Freeport. Two of the items are a Kolandi (sp?) fish from Temple
of Life in Qeynos (found that, loved the faction hit didnt know you
could p/o a Diety) the other was Erud's Tonic now that's where I dead
end. Supposedly it's sold at a merchant in Erudian, well I checked every
single merchant on the isle (and had Erudians check the ones who
wouldn't talk to me) and none sold it (Side Note: Picked up Innorukk's
Kiss of Death, Lore Item, any ideas what it's for?).

Four NPCs talk about Erud's Tonic...One is Mordoor (something) a Erudian
near Crow's in Qeynos, he says he's sick and needs Erud's Tonic which
supposedly is sold in Erudian according to him (side note: to poison him
is a different quest), Second NPC is (something) Bluehawk in Bluehawk's
in Erudian, he says Erud's Tonic is not for travelers, even to Erudites,
the Third NPC is the Bookworm (forget name, she will say bookworm when
hailed) in the Library in Erudian, she says Erud's Tonic should not be
spoken of,......and last but not least there the Gnome in the Erudian
jail, ask him and he says, he did not know you could not leave Erudian
with Erud's Tonic and please get him out of jail. Now my ultimate
decision maybe to kill the Gnome maybe he still has it on him but I
really don't want to take a faction hit like that, beside with this one
quest you become a hunted person by two major groups.
